title: Patch time?
body: I've been reading through the boards and heard talk that today is patch day. I am wondering what time of day patches are usually released on "patch day". I'm also wondering if "patch day" is really a thing and if today is it.  Also, any idea when TEEMO will be reenabled? Thank you!

replies.body: There was a patch last week, but I'm not aware of one for today.  You can bookmark our[ patch page ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch)to prepare for any upcoming patches.  Our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page will also give a heads up on any downtime that is schedule for things like patches.  I don't have any info on when Teemo will be re-enabled, but that status page will provide updates on it.  Hope that helps clear things up!
